text: A year has passed since Sudan was plunged into civil war, a crisis that's spiraling in the shadows of global focus on Gaza & Ukraine. The people of Sudan, particularly in Darfur, are facing soaring food prices & the threat of famine. We cannot ignore this humanitarian catastrophe. The roots of this hunger problem lie in access & funding. It's our collective responsibility to support organizations working tirelessly to alleviate the suffering of the Sudanese people. Share this message and donate if you can. #SudanCrisis #StandWithSudan üåçüíî
